Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 75th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: Eastbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Vincennes, 79th, and the Red Line, due to street blockage near 75th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Vincennes, 79th, and the Red Line, due to street blockage near 75th/Lafayette.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Southbound Reroute near Belmont/Hudson
ShortDescription: SB 156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound 1#56 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

Northbound buses are not affected.
